remarks: Extend a finite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 31-May-2019.)
statement:
gsumzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzcl.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzres.s $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) C_ W ) $.
gsumzres.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzres $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F |` W ) ) = ( G gsum F ) ) $.
